alert.note: Alert for Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 10:34AM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...Missouri...Illinois... Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at Cairo. Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. .Recent heavy rainfall and snow melt will continue to keep water levels on the lower Ohio River in or near minor flood this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 38.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening and continue falling to 20.4 feet Sunday, January 23. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
